DefaultApplicationSettingsProvider

The default implementation of the ApplicationSettingsProvider protocol. Uses NSUserDefaults under the hood.

  • userDefaults

    The NSUserDefaults instance used by the receiver.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let userDefaults: NSUserDefaults
  • settingNames()

    Returns the names of the application settings for which values currently exist.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func settingNames()
        -> [String]

    Return Value

    The application settings names

  • valueOfSetting(_:)

    Returns the value of the setting with the specified name.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func valueOfSetting(name: String)
        -> NSObject?

    Parameters

    name

    The setting name

    Return Value

    The value of the setting, or nil if none exists
